item.title: [Java Question]About loading things from another file[Java]
item.dc:creator: @JolBB JolBB
item.description:
@JolBB wrote:

So does anyone know how to do this and care to explain it so I can learn from it?

an example of this would be…

item.cfg

995 = Money
997 = Bronze Sword

username.java

itemone = 995 2000000 itemtwo = 997 1

the code would be like…

if(username.money>25){ "You buy the item."; } else{ "You do not have enough money."; }

anyone know how to do this?

Read full topic
